text: Bleacher Report is an American media company that focuses on sports and sports culture. Its headquarters are in San Francisco, with offices in New York City and London. Bleacher Report was bought by Turner Broadcasting System in August 2012 for $175 million.Time Warner 2014 10-K, p.87. ==History== Bleacher Report was formed in 2005 by David Finocchio, Alexander Freund, Bryan Goldberg, and Dave Nemetz. They wanted to start writing about sports. ==References== Category:Companies based in San Francisco Category:Sports media
title: Bleacher Report
